ids_info.name: gas_injection
ids_info.description: Gas injection by a system of pipes and valves

gas_injection/pipe/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device)

gas_injection/pipe/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”

gas_injection/pipe/species.documentation: Species injected by the pipe (may be more than one in case the valve injects a gas mixture)

gas_injection/pipe/species/element.documentation: List of elements forming the atom or molecule

gas_injection/pipe/species/element/atoms.documentation: Number of atoms of this element in the molecule

gas_injection/pipe/species/name.documentation: String identifying neutral (e.g. H, D, T, He, C, ...)

gas_injection/pipe/species/fraction.documentation: Relative fraction of this species (in molecules) in the gas mixture

gas_injection/pipe/exit_position.documentation: Exit position of the pipe in the vaccum vessel

gas_injection/pipe/exit_position/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above)

gas_injection/pipe/second_point.documentation: Second point indicating (combined with the exit_position) the direction of the gas injection towards the plasma

gas_injection/pipe/second_point/phi.documentation: Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above)

gas_injection/pipe/flow_rate.documentation: Flow rate at the exit of the pipe

gas_injection/pipe/valve_indices.documentation: Indices (from the ../../valve array of structure) of the valve(s) that are feeding this pipe

gas_injection/valve.documentation: Set of valves connecting a gas bottle to pipes

gas_injection/valve/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device)

gas_injection/valve/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”

gas_injection/valve/species.documentation: Species injected by the valve (may be more than one in case the valve injects a gas mixture)

gas_injection/valve/species/element.documentation: List of elements forming the atom or molecule

gas_injection/valve/species/element/atom.documentation: Number of atoms of this element in the molecule

gas_injection/valve/species/name.documentation: String identifying neutral (e.g. H, D, T, He, C, ...)

gas_injection/valve/species/fraction.documentation: Relative fraction of this species (in molecules) in the gas mixture

gas_injection/valve/flow_rate_min.documentation: Minimum flow rate of the valve

gas_injection/valve/flow_rate_max.documentation: Maximum flow rate of the valve

gas_injection/valve/flow_rate.documentation: Flow rate at the exit of the valve

gas_injection/valve/electron_rate.documentation: Number of electrons injected per second

gas_injection/valve/pipe_indices.documentation: Indices (from the ../../pipe array of structure) of the pipe(s) that are fed by this valve

gas_injection/valve/voltage.documentation: Voltage applied to open the valve (raw data used to compute the gas flow rate)

gas_injection/valve/response_curve.documentation: Response curve of the valve, i.e. gas flow rate obtained as a function of the applied voltage.

gas_injection/valve/response_curve/volta.documentation: Voltage applied to open the valve

gas_injection/valve/response_curve/flow_.documentation: Flow rate at the exit of the valve

gas_injection/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between input command received from the RT network and actuator starting to react. Applies globally to the system described by this IDS unless specific latencies (e.g. channel-specific or antenna-specific) are provided at a deeper level in the IDS structure.
